FeatureSection.title: Say goodbye to storage constraints!
description: With our paid plans, you can store and access your files locally without consuming your device’s physical drive space.
Enjoy peace of mind knowing your memories and important documents are safely backed up in the cloud, accessible on any device.

WhatWeDoSection.title: Internxt ensures your privacy is protected
WhatWeDoSection.description: We implement the best security to secure your files and documents:

features: Data secured at rest and in transit

faq.question: What is Internxt Drive?
answer: Internxt Drive is a zero-knowledge file storage service built for absolute privacy and strict security. Our service doesn’t access your personal data or files. Instead, it is designed to give you back control over your files and protect you from data collectors.

faq.question: How do I upgrade my free plan?
answer: Your 75% discount will be applied automatically at checkout. To claim your discount, select your monthly, annual, or lifetime plan and proceed to the checkout page.

faq.question: What is Internxt’s refund policy?
answer: Internxt offers a standard 30-day money-back guarantee across all its paid subscriptions, which starts counting as soon as you subscribe.
If you're ever unsatisfied with our service, reach out to us at [hello@internxt.com](mailto:hello@internxt.com) and request a refund. We will honor your request, no questions asked!

faq.question: Can I pay with credit card, PayPal, or cryptocurrency?
answer: Internxt currently accepts debit and credit cards (Mastercard, VISA, American Express, etc). You can also pay via PayPal, iDEAL, Sofort and Bancontact.
We also accept Cryptocurrency and SEPA Debit upon request. If you have doubts about payment methods, simply email us at [hello@internxt.com](mailto:hello@internxt.com).

faq.question: How can I cancel my subscription?
answer: Canceling your subscription is simple. Open the Internxt app, navigate to settings, and select 'Cancel Subscription.' This action will terminate your subscription immediately, and your account will revert to a free plan.

Please note that any remaining time on your current paid subscription will not be refunded or carried over. For instance, if you cancel a one-year plan with four months remaining, you will lose access to those remaining four months.
You can also cancel a paid plan and your Internxt account via settings, which will delete your subscription, account, and all your files.

faq.question: Can I add more storage to my lifetime plan?
answer: Yes, you can add up as much storage as you want to your Internxt lifetime membership. Internxt lifetime plans are stackable. Simply purchase them with the same email address and contact us at [hello@internxt.com](mailto:hello@internxt.com) so we can stack them together for you on the same account.

faq.question: Does Internxt store my password?
answer: No. As such, Internxt does not (and cannot) store your password.
Your Internxt password is unique to you and is used to encrypt and decrypt your Internxt data. However, you can change your password from our app.

faq.question: Can I enable 2FA?
answer: Yes. You can configure two-factor Authentication for your account through the Internxt web app.
You can also use Authy or other 2FA tools to generate a personal 2FA code with Internxt.
